Text: Game seems to work, downloaded SKIDROW's release, added this crack and cracked it with the crack included. Challenge mode is available for selection in single player menu.
Where do I access the single player DLC content? :-/
There is no singleplayer dlc content. Only challenge mode.
does this only includes the challenge mode? I really can't see any difference except for that accessible challenge mode...
BTW, is this the DLC pack released by Valve for this October 4th?
I'm sorry, made a mistake in my previous comment. I added the patch and then cracked it, didn't really crack it twice. Also, thanks for the upload.
It includes DLC pack from Valve.DLC contains challenge mode + 9 maps for coop. Maplist is located in portal_2dlc_1 folder. All dlc coop maps are playable with the old method

Okay, to finish my series of comments, the co-op part works perfectly (the new campaign), just finished it.

Only had to restart once, when my partner's game suddenly decided to exit itself.

This works great thanks.

And it includes all the patches except for the 2 most recent.

Thanks again.
